# Repository Information for GitHub SEO

## Short Description (max 350 characters)
Modern full-stack blog CMS built with Laravel 11, React 18, TypeScript, and Inertia.js. Features include admin panel, user management, hierarchical categories, tags, media library with folder support, 2FA authentication, SEO optimization, and responsive design.

## About Section (350 chars max)
A modern, feature-rich blog platform with Laravel backend and React frontend. Includes comprehensive admin panel, media management, hierarchical categories, SEO optimization, and two-factor authentication. Perfect for developers building content-driven websites.

## Key Features to Highlight in About
- Laravel 11 + React 18 + TypeScript stack
- Complete admin panel with CRUD operations  
- Media library with folder organization
- Hierarchical categories with SEO
- Two-factor authentication
- Responsive design with dark mode
